content:
# I have successfully crafted 1 electronic circuit. My inventory now contains:
# - 5 wood
# - 5 stone
# - 2 iron plates
# - 1 copper plate
# - 1 copper cable
# - 1 iron gear wheel
# - 1 electronic circuit

# With the electronic circuit crafted, I now have all the necessary components to create an assembling machine, which requires:
# - 3 Iron Plates
# - 1 Iron Gear Wheel
# - 1 Electronic Circuit

# I currently have:
# - 2 Iron Plates (I need 3)
# - 1 Iron Gear Wheel
# - 1 Electronic Circuit

# I need to craft one more iron plate to complete the requirements for the assembling machine.
# Let's craft 1 additional iron plate using the stone furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=1)  # Insert 1 iron ore to smelt into an iron plate.

# After inserting the iron ore, I will wait for the smelting to complete.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait.
    current_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
    if current_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 1:  # Wait until we have 1 iron plate.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout for iron ore - please check resources.")

# Once the smelting is complete, I will extract the iron plate.
extracted_iron_plate = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, position=stone_furnace_entity.position, quantity=1)

# After extracting the iron plate, I will check my inventory.
print(f"Inventory after extracting iron plate: {inspect_inventory()}")
